body:
Neat. :+1: 

Sidebar: I see some merit of deprecating `tf.get_variable` actually. Python already has classes, so much of it is redundant. It's also a bit weird to see neural network specific stuff like Glorot initialization in TensorFlow's top package instead of in `tf.nn`.
